Html.content:
In the source code below you see, how easy it is to adapt images to your needs. In line 21, you initialize the ImageBean with

<c:set var="imageBean" value="${value.Image.toImage}"/>.

The ImageBean is then used to scale the image to five sizes with ${imageBean.scaleWidth['size']}. The used sizes are the often used breakpoints between different screen sizes. With ${imageBean.scaleWidth['size'].scaleHiDpi['2x']} we create an additional image of double resolution to optimize the display of the image on devices with double resolution screens such as retina displays.
